short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: the bidder must file a response deadline to modify the closing time and bid submission On April 14, 2023 by 2:00 PM EDT: Any bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT in the bid may be deemed non-responsive
description: amendment to closing time in procurement process, standing offer for aviation fuels in accordance with standards of Canadian General Standards Board
tags: Associated with several Free Trade Agreements including CUFTA, CETA, CPTPP, etc. and is a part of a National Master Contracting process
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer for Aviation Fuel (Into-Plane)
## Notice Reference Number and Solicitation Number
WS3824587166-Doc3942061523

## Posting Information
- **Public Posting Date**: March 29, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: April 14, 2023 (02:00 PM EDT)
- **Procurement Category**: Goods
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Standing Offer Details
- **Contract Period**: May 1, 2022, to May 31, 2024
- **Tender Description**: National Master Standing Offers for aviation fuels (Into-Plane) in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as applicable.
- **Delivery Locations**: Various locations throughout Canada (See Annex A for detailed list of delivery regions)
- **Quantity**: Varies
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Information**:
  - **Name**: MacLeod, Bobbi (SPAC/PSPC)
  - **Email**: [bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  - **Phone Number**: Not Available
  - **Fax Number**: Not Available

## Trade Agreements
This procurement may be subject to the following Trade Agreements:
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Annex A - Delivery Regions

The following regions are included in the delivery schedule for this procurement:
- British Columbia
- Quebec (except National Capital Region)
- Alberta
- Manitoba
- Saskatchewan
- Yukon
- New Brunswick
- Newfoundland and Labrador
- National Capital Region
- Northwest Territories
- Nova Scotia
- Ontario (except National Capital Region)
- Prince Edward Island

Note: This notice
